scene_description_enriched: Two haloed male figures stand facing each other. The figure on the left, with a long white beard, wears a dark robe and gestures with his left hand towards a book held by the figure on the right. The figure on the right, also bearded, wears a reddish-brown robe and holds an open book in his left hand, with his right hand resting on a staff or cross. Both figures are depicted against a dark background adorned with ornate, swirling foliate motifs. The ground beneath them is tiled in a checkerboard pattern. The scene is framed by a decorative archway.
